Publication Title: Management of Advanced Prostate Cancer in the Precision Oncology Era
Publication Keywords: Immunotherapy, Chemotherapy, Biomarkers, Theranostics, Advanced Prostate Cancer, Genomic Selection, Parp Inhibitors, Metastatic Prostate Cancer, Psma, Radioligand Therapy
Publication Authors: Claire M Gillette, Gabriel A Yette, Scott D Cramer, Laura S Graham
Publication Abstract: Prostate cancer (PC) is the second leading cause of cancer death in men in the United States. While diversified and improved treatment options for aggressive PC have improved patient outcomes, metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer (mCRPC) remains incurable and an area of investigative therapeutic interest. Publication Title: A harmonized resource of integrated prostate cancer clinical, -omic, and signature features
Publication Authors: Teemu D Laajala, Varsha Sreekanth, Alex C Soupir, Jordan H Creed, Anni S Halkola, Federico C F Calboli, Kalaimathy Singaravelu, Michael V Orman, Christelle Colin-Leitzinger, Travis Gerke, Brooke L Fridley, Svitlana Tyekucheva, James C Costello
Publication Abstract: Genomic and transcriptomic data have been generated across a wide range of prostate cancer (PCa) study cohorts. These data can be used to better characterize the molecular features associated with clinical outcomes and to test hypotheses across multiple, independent patient cohorts.
